title: GoFundMe set up for dog stabbed in home invasion
text:
Animal lovers in the Worcester area are coming together to help a Chihuahua puppy that was stabbed during a home invasion.
Kona, the 12-week-old puppy, was in a Worcester home on Oct. 4 when two men entered the home with a knife and a gun to attack the inhabitants.
The robbers stabbed one man who also suffered a broken leg and injured shoulder. Another man suffered a head injury during the attack. In addition, a 2-year-old girl was home during the attack but not injured.
A GoFundMe account is set up to help Kona, a 12-week-old puppy, that was stabbed during a home invasion. Photo MyFoxBoston. >> Read more trending stories
Kona was treated at the Cummings School of Veterinary Medicine for her stab wounds, but an infection took hold and he needs additional surgery.
To donate to Konaâ€™s hospital bills visit the GoFundMe pag e that has been set up.
